Describe Chipchan here.

Chipchan aka Diskochip (discochip) is the world's first DJ ROBODOG. Created on July 7, 1977, C.H.I.P.C.H.A.N. was a robotic 'pet' intended to assist humans and capable of single skill mastery. Chipchan began making music while on a spaceship with his sidekick Billy. Together Billy and Chip create music to educate children.
